summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1662, for the improvement of Main Street, in the City of Seattle, form the west margin of the alley between 1st Avenue South and Railroad Avenue, to the east margin of Railroad Avenue, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, constructing granite curbs and laying such sewers and water mains as may be necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage and water service, of said district, under Ordinance No. 17544 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
